bill.title: Relating To Law Enforcement.
bill.description: Requires the Legislative Reference Bureau to conduct a study that examines consolidating the law enforcement activities and responsibilities of various state divisions and agencies under a single, centralized state enforcement division or agency. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to GVO/JDC/PSM, WAM.
The committee(s) on GVO/JDC/PSM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-08-18 3:00PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on PSM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PSM were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Baker; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) L. Thielen; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Wakai.

The committee(s) on GVO recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in GVO were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Keith-Agaran, K. Rhoads; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ruderman ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, K. Rhoads, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) L. Thielen; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard.
Reported from GVO/JDC/PSM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2426) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-21-18 10:10AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, English, Galuteria, Inouye, K. Kahele, Kidani, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 2 No(es): Senator(s) Harimoto, Riviere; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2735) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-06-18.

Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Espero, Harimoto, Ihara, K. Rhoads . Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Riviere, L. Thielen). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 357) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 36
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Thursday, 03-15-18 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Holt, Evans, Ichiyama, Keohokalole, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1180-18) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Fukumoto, Har, Holt, Nakashima, Souki, Tokioka excused (7).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Wednesday, 03-21-18 2:15PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, San Buenaventura, Morikawa, Takayama; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, C. Lee, McDermott.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1362-18), recommending referral to FIN.

Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Thielen, Tupola voting no (2) and Representative(s) C. Lee, Lowen, McDermott, Souki, Tokioka excused (5).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 03-28-18 4:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Cachola, Gates, Holt, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, Lowen, Nakamura, Todd, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Ward; 0 Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) DeCoite, Fukumoto, Tupola.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1869-18), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Thielen, Tupola, Ward voting no (3) and Representative(s) Choy, Holt, C. Lee, LoPresti, Nakashima, Quinlan excused (6). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 471).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 574).
House Conferees Appointed: Johanson, Nishimoto, Cullen Co-Chairs; McDermott.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 610).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Kim Chair; Taniguchi, Nishihara, K. Kahele Co-Chairs; Ruderman.
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-26-18 9:00AM in conference room 329.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 833).
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-26-18 2:30PM in conference room 429.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Taniguchi, K. Kahele, Ruderman; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Nishihara.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Nishimoto, Cullen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 131-18).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-01-18.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 131-18) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday 05-01-18.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Tupola voting no (1) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 849).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 705).
Enrolled to Governor.
